title: Michael Gove reveals he made bet against Matt Hancock over Boris Johnsons’ Brexit deal
text:
Michael Gove has revealed he made a bet against Matt Hancock over Boris Johnsons’ Brexit deal.

The bet between the Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster and the Health Secretary was said to be based on the size of the majority for Brexit, not whether or not the UK leaves on October 31st.

"We're going to deliver by the 31st October, we are going to ensure that we get this deal done and I'm confident that with the support of good people with whom we may have disagreed in the past, but who respect democracy we will get this deal done," Mr Gove told Sky News’ Sophy Ridge on Sunday.

When asked if he had placed money on the outcome Mr Gove confirmed: “Yes, I have.”

However, he would not reveal how...
description: Michael Gove has revealed he made a bet against Matt Hancock over Boris Johnsons’ Brexit deal.
